com.sitewhere.spi.device.event.request

Interface IDeviceRegistrationRequest

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IDeviceEventCreateRequest, IDeviceStateChangeCreateRequest
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DeviceRegistrationRequest

    public interface IDeviceRegistrationRequest
extends IDeviceStateChangeCreateRequest
    Interface for arguments needed to register a device.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getHardwareId()
      Get hardware id to be registered.
      java.lang.String getSiteToken()
      Get token for site to which device should be assigned.
      java.lang.String getSpecificationToken()
      Get token for device hardware specification.
